name: Very Hat Trip
description:
Very Hat Trip is about a cute fox being given a hat and being able to see the world through different people's eyes depending on the hat.

The fox is curious about other people's way to see the world, but will soon find out that copying others isn't the best way to go about finding your own identity ...

Made in the GGJ2018

_______________________________________________________

Current Version: 1.7

WIP:

  • New assets
  • Interface
  • Level Design
  • Storyline

_______________________________________________________

WARNING: Some animations can induce epileptic episodes, please do not play this game if you're sensitive to quick movements and flashing colors.
